title: Login error
body:
Throughout today ive been trying to log in to play my favourite game, league of legends. When i do, it says "Starting authentication process. waiting for server", then it says "did not receive a response from the server, retrying (attempt 1,2,3)" I've tried everything and still nothing, its been 7 hours now and i don't know what to do. Added note, i am running League Of Legends on a Mac. Please help!

Thanks in advance
-Pilgrim

replies.body:
These boards, I don't know how to describe them in a good way. Everyone comes here to post about their problem, expecting someone to reply with fifteen minutes with a perfect solution to their issue. But in reality only people come to post here about their problems, and don't really stay around to help others.

I'll be here though. I'm always here.

What ISP are you with? Have you already tried [using an alternative DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4)?
